scripts.ceremony:0:setup: mkdir -p ceremony && snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 14 ceremony/pot14_0000.ptau -v
scripts.ceremony:1:contribute: snarkjs powersoftau contribute ceremony/pot14_0000.ptau ceremony/pot14_0001.ptau --name="My contribution" -v -e="some random text"
scripts.ceremony:3:finalize:phase-1: snarkjs powersoftau beacon ceremony/pot14_0001.ptau ceremony/pot14_beacon.ptau 0102030405060708090a0b0c0d0e0f101112131415161718191a1b1c1d1e1f 10 -n="Final Beacon"
scripts.ceremony:4:prepare:phase-2: snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 ceremony/pot14_beacon.ptau ceremony/pot14_final.ptau -v
scripts.export: snarkjs r1cs export json out/circuit.r1cs out/circuit.r1cs.json
scripts.plonk:setup: snarkjs plonk setup out/circuit.r1cs ceremony/pot14_final.ptau out/circuit_final.zkey
scripts.//plonk:verify: snarkjs zkey verify out/circuit.r1cs ceremony/pot14_final.ptau out/circuit_final.zkey
scripts.verification:export-key: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey out/circuit_final.zkey out/verification_key.json
scripts.plonk:proof: snarkjs plonk prove out/circuit_final.zkey out/witness.wtns out/proof.json out/public.json
scripts.proof:verify: snarkjs plonk verify out/verification_key.json out/public.json out/proof.json
scripts.solidity:generate: mkdir -p contracts && snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier out/circuit_final.zkey contracts/verifier.sol
scripts.solidity:calldata: snarkjs zkey export soliditycalldata out/public.json out/proof.json
scripts.export-for-web-and-contracts: cp out/circuit_final.zkey ../web/static/ && cp out/circuit_js/circuit.wasm ../web/static/ && cp out/verification_key.json ../web/static/ && cp -R contracts/* ../contracts/circuits
scripts.test: pnpm compile && pnpm witness:calculate && pnpm verification:export-key && node test.js
